Body:
model = 1
cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, sigma8=0.8, n_s=
    0.96, Neff=0, m_nu=0.0, w0=-1.0, wa=0.0, m_nu_type='normal', Omega_g=0,
    Omega_k=0, transfer_function='eisenstein_hu', matter_power_spectrum=
    'linear')
data = np.loadtxt('./benchmarks/data/model%d_pk_eh.txt' % model)
k = data[:, (0)] * cosmo['h']
for i in range(1):
    a = 1.0 / (1.0 + i)
    pk = data[:, (i + 1)] / cosmo['h'] ** 3
    pk_ccl = ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmo, k, a)
    err = np.abs(pk_ccl / pk - 1)
    assert np.allclose(err, 0, rtol=0, atol=EH_TOLERANCE)
